metadata.description: Letter to General Basilio Valdes from Committee on Foreign Relations Chairman Manuel A. Alzate (1st District, Nueva Ecija) regarding the enactment of legislation authorizing Valdes to accept the order and rank and to wear the corresponding decorations conferred upon him by the Government General of French Indo-China, the King of the Belgians and the Emperor of Annam
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; Commonwealth; awards and decorations
metadata.title: Letter to General Basilio Valdes from Committee on Foreign Relations Chairman Manuel A. Alzate (1st District, Nueva Ecija)
